messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

th floor burglary alarm triggered today around sent thursday th floor burglary alarm triggered today around hi guys please action below thanks incident manager sent thursday re th floor burglary alarm triggered today around hi yes please raise get touch with quartz order understand what happened regards sent wednesday th floor burglary alarm triggered today around hello could you please advise how should we proceed with below should we contact quartz we need log for looking forward your kind regards incident manager
